attributes.comment:
USCIS-2006-0044-0001

i would like to object to the proposed fee increase. the financial and emotional
demands of adoption are very strong, especially with families who are struggling
with infertilitiy issues. i believe this agency is taking unfair advantage of individuals
who are in very vulnerable positions. the fees are unjust. there have been fee
increases in the past and these have done nothing to improve the lack of service or
to decrease processing times. the local agencies are not reachable, the staff is
not trained appropriately to complete their jobs, each month we watch as
processing times increase. the service will not be improved by making people who
just want a child shoulder more of a burden than they are already required to
carry. i believe more wisdom should be exercised within the offices of this
government entity to make better use of the funds you have available.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Arlene Tate
